verses.verse: Then <S%H3378>Jerubbaal<s%> (that is, <S%H1439>Gideon<s%>) and <S%H3605>all<s%> the <S%H5971>people<s%> <S%H834>who<s%> were with him, <S%H7925>rose<s%> <S%H7925>early<s%> and <S%H2583>camped<s%> <S%H5921>beside<s%> the <S%H9407>spring<s%> of <S%H9166>Harod;<s%> and the <S%H4264>camp<s%> of <S%H4080>Midian<s%> was on the <S%H6828>north<s%> <S%H6828>side<s%> of them by the <S%H1389>hill<s%> of <S%H4176>Moreh<s%> in the <S%H6010>valley.<s%>

And the <S%H3068>Lord<s%> <S%H559>said<s%> to <S%H1439>Gideon,<s%> "The <S%H5971>people<s%> <S%H834>who<s%> are with you are <S%H4480>too<s%> <S%H7227>many<s%> for Me to <S%H5414>give<s%> <S%H4080>Midian<s%> into their <S%H3027>hands,<s%> <S%H6435>lest<s%> <S%H3478>Israel<s%> <S%H6286>become<s%> <S%H6286>boastful,<s%> <S%H559>saying,<s%> 'My own <S%H3027>power<s%> has <S%H3467>delivered<s%> me.'

<S%H6258>"Now<s%> therefore <S%H4994>come,<s%> <S%H7121>proclaim<s%> in the <S%H241>hearing<s%> of the <S%H5971>people,<s%> <S%H559>saying,<s%> <S%H4310>'Whoever<s%> is <S%H3372>afraid<s%> and <S%H2730>trembling,<s%> let him <S%H7725>return<s%> and <S%H6852>depart<s%> from <S%H2022>Mount<s%> <S%H1568>Gilead.<s%>'" So 22000 <S%H5971>people<s%> <S%H7725>returned,<s%> but 10000 <S%H7604>remained.<s%>

Then the <S%H3068>Lord<s%> <S%H559>said<s%> to <S%H1439>Gideon,<s%> "The <S%H5971>people<s%> are <S%H5750>still<s%> too <S%H7227>many;<s%> <S%H3381>bring<s%> them <S%H3381>down<s%> to the <S%H4325>water<s%> and I will <S%H6884>test<s%> them for you <S%H8033>there.<s%> Therefore it shall be that he of <S%H834>whom<s%> I <S%H559>say<s%> to you, <S%H2088>'This<s%> <S%H2088>one<s%> shall <S%H1980>go<s%> with you,' he shall <S%H1980>go<s%> with you; but <S%H3605>everyone<s%> of <S%H834>whom<s%> I <S%H559>say<s%> to you, <S%H2088>'This<s%> <S%H2088>one<s%> shall not <S%H1980>go<s%> with you,' he shall not <S%H1980>go.<s%>"

So he <S%H3381>brought<s%> the <S%H5971>people<s%> <S%H3381>down<s%> to the <S%H4325>water.<s%> And the <S%H3068>Lord<s%> <S%H559>said<s%> to <S%H1439>Gideon,<s%> "You shall <S%H905>separate<s%> <S%H3605>everyone<s%> <S%H834>who<s%> <S%H3952>laps<s%> the <S%H4325>water<s%> with his <S%H3956>tongue,<s%> as a <S%H3611>dog<s%> <S%H3952>laps,<s%> as well as <S%H3605>everyone<s%> <S%H834>who<s%> <S%H1290>kneels<s%> <S%H3766><s%> to <S%H8354>drink.<s%>"

Now the <S%H4557>number<s%> of those who <S%H3952>lapped,<s%> putting their <S%H3027>hand<s%> to their <S%H6310>mouth,<s%> was 300 <S%H376>men;<s%> but <S%H3605>all<s%> the <S%H3499>rest<s%> of the <S%H5971>people<s%> <S%H3766>kneeled<s%> <S%H1290><s%> to <S%H8354>drink<s%> <S%H4325>water.<s%>

And the <S%H3068>Lord<s%> <S%H559>said<s%> to <S%H1439>Gideon,<s%> "I will <S%H3467>deliver<s%> you with <S%H300>the<s%> <S%H376>men<s%> who <S%H3952>lapped<s%> and will <S%H5414>give<s%> the <S%H4080>Midianites<s%> into your <S%H3027>hands;<s%> so let <S%H3605>all<s%> the [other] <S%H5971>people<s%> <S%H1980>go,<s%> <S%H376>each<s%> <S%H376>man<s%> to his <S%H4725>home.<s%>"

So <S%H300>the<s%> men <S%H3947>took<s%> the people's <S%H6720>provisions<s%> and their <S%H7782>trumpets<s%> into their <S%H3027>hands.<s%> And Gideon <S%H7971>sent<s%> <S%H3605>all<s%> the [other] <S%H376>men<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel,<s%> <S%H376>each<s%> to his <S%H168>tent,<s%> but <S%H2388>retained<s%> <S%H300>the<s%> <S%H376>men;<s%> and the <S%H4264>camp<s%> of <S%H4080>Midian<s%> was <S%H4480>below<s%> <S%H8478><s%> him in the <S%H6010>valley.<s%>

Now the <S%H1931>same<s%> <S%H3915>night<s%> it <S%H1961>came<s%> about that the <S%H3068>Lord<s%> <S%H559>said<s%> to him, <S%H6965>"Arise,<s%> <S%H3381>go<s%> <S%H3381>down<s%> against the <S%H4264>camp,<s%> for I have <S%H5414>given<s%> it into your <S%H3027>hands.<s%>
"But <S%H518>if<s%> you are <S%H3372>afraid<s%> to <S%H3381>go<s%> <S%H3381>down,<s%> <S%H3381>go<s%> with <S%H6513>Purah<s%> your <S%H5288>servant<s%> <S%H3381>down<s%> to the <S%H4264>camp,<s%>

and you will <S%H8085>hear<s%> <S%H4100>what<s%> they <S%H1696>say;<s%> and <S%H310>afterward<s%> your <S%H3027>hands<s%> will be <S%H2388>strengthened<s%> that you may <S%H3381>go<s%> <S%H3381>down<s%> against the <S%H4264>camp.<s%> "So he <S%H3381>went<s%> with <S%H6513>Purah<s%> his <S%H5288>servant<s%> <S%H3381>down<s%> to the <S%H7097>outposts<s%> of the <S%H2571>army<s%> that was in the <S%H4264>camp.<s%>

Now the <S%H4080>Midianites<s%> and the <S%H6002>Amalekites<s%> and <S%H3605>all<s%> the <S%H1121>sons<s%> of the <S%H6924>east<s%> were <S%H5307>lying<s%> in the <S%H6010>valley<s%> as <S%H7230>numerous<s%> as <S%H697>locusts;<s%> and their <S%H1581>camels<s%> were <S%H369>without<s%> <S%H4557>number,<s%> as <S%H7230>numerous<s%> as the <S%H2344>sand<s%> on the <S%H3220>seashore.<s%> <S%H8193><s%>

When <S%H1439>Gideon<s%> <S%H935>came,<s%> <S%H2009>behold,<s%> a <S%H376>man<s%> was <S%H5608>relating<s%> a <S%H2472>dream<s%> to his <S%H7453>friend.<s%> And he <S%H559>said,<s%> <S%H2009>"Behold,<s%> I <S%H2492>had<s%> a <S%H2472>dream;<s%> a <S%H6742>loaf<s%> of <S%H8184>barley<s%> <S%H3899>bread<s%> was <S%H2015>tumbling<s%> into the <S%H4264>camp<s%> of <S%H4080>Midian,<s%> and it <S%H935>came<s%> to the <S%H168>tent<s%> and <S%H5221>struck<s%> it so that it <S%H5307>fell,<s%> and <S%H2015>turned<s%> it <S%H4605>upside<s%> <S%H4605>down<s%> so that the <S%H168>tent<s%> <S%H5307>lay<s%> <S%H5307>flat.<s%>"

And his <S%H7453>friend<s%> <S%H6030>answered<s%> and <S%H559>said,<s%> <S%H2088>"This<s%> is <S%H369>nothing<s%> <S%H1115>less<s%> <S%H518><s%> <S%H1115>than<s%> <S%H518><s%> the <S%H2719>sword<s%> of <S%H1439>Gideon<s%> the <S%H1121>son<s%> of <S%H3060>Joash,<s%> a <S%H376>man<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel;<s%> <S%H430>God<s%> has <S%H5414>given<s%> <S%H4080>Midian<s%> and <S%H3605>all<s%> the <S%H4264>camp<s%> into his <S%H3027>hand.<s%>"

And it <S%H1961>came<s%> about when <S%H1439>Gideon<s%> <S%H8085>heard<s%> the <S%H4557>account<s%> of the <S%H2472>dream<s%> and its <S%H7667>interpretation,<s%> that he <S%H7812>bowed<s%> in <S%H7812>worship.<s%> He <S%H7725>returned<s%> to the <S%H4264>camp<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel<s%> and <S%H559>said,<s%> <S%H6965>"Arise,<s%> for the <S%H3068>Lord<s%> has <S%H5414>given<s%> the <S%H4264>camp<s%> of <S%H4080>Midian<s%> into your <S%H3027>hands.<s%>"

And he <S%H2673>divided<s%> <S%H300>the<s%> <S%H376>men<s%> into <S%H7969>three<s%> <S%H7218>companies,<s%> and he <S%H5414>put<s%> <S%H7782>trumpets<s%> and <S%H7386>empty<s%> <S%H3537>pitchers<s%> into the <S%H3027>hands<s%> of <S%H3605>all<s%> of them, with <S%H3940>torches<s%> <S%H8432>inside<s%> the <S%H3537>pitchers.<s%>

And he <S%H559>said<s%> to them, <S%H7200>"Look<s%> at me, and <S%H6213>do<s%> <S%H3651>likewise.<s%> And <S%H2009>behold,<s%> when I <S%H935>come<s%> to the <S%H7097>outskirts<s%> of the <S%H4264>camp,<s%> <S%H6213>do<s%> as I <S%H6213>do.<s%>

"When I and <S%H3605>all<s%> <S%H834>who<s%> are with me <S%H8628>blow<s%> the <S%H7782>trumpet,<s%> then you <S%H1571>also<s%> <S%H8628>blow<s%> the <S%H7782>trumpets<s%> <S%H3605>all<s%> <S%H5439>around<s%> the <S%H4264>camp,<s%> and <S%H559>say,<s%> 'For the <S%H3068>Lord<s%> and for <S%H1439>Gideon.<s%>'"

So <S%H1439>Gideon<s%> and the <S%H3967>hundred<s%> <S%H376>men<s%> <S%H834>who<s%> were with him <S%H935>came<s%> to the <S%H7097>outskirts<s%> of the <S%H4264>camp<s%> at the <S%H7218>beginning<s%> of the <S%H8484>middle<s%> <S%H8104>watch,<s%> <S%H389>when<s%> they had <S%H389>just<s%> <S%H6965>posted<s%> the <S%H821>watch;<s%> and they <S%H8628>blew<s%> the <S%H7782>trumpets<s%> and <S%H5310>smashed<s%> the <S%H3537>pitchers<s%> that were in their <S%H3027>hands.<s%>

When the <S%H7969>three<s%> <S%H7218>companies<s%> <S%H8628>blew<s%> the <S%H7782>trumpets<s%> and <S%H7665>broke<s%> the <S%H3537>pitchers,<s%> they <S%H2388>held<s%> the <S%H3940>torches<s%> in their <S%H8040>left<s%> <S%H3027>hands<s%> and the <S%H7782>trumpets<s%> in their <S%H3225>right<s%> <S%H3027>hands<s%> for <S%H8628>blowing,<s%> and <S%H7121>cried,<s%> "A <S%H2719>sword<s%> for the <S%H3068>Lord<s%> and for <S%H1439>Gideon!<s%>"

And <S%H376>each<s%> <S%H5975>stood<s%> in his <S%H8478>place<s%> <S%H5439>around<s%> the <S%H4264>camp;<s%> and <S%H3605>all<s%> the <S%H4264>army<s%> <S%H7323>ran,<s%> <S%H7321>crying<s%> out as they <S%H5127>fled.<s%>

And when they <S%H8628>blew<s%> <S%H300><s%> <S%H7782>trumpets,<s%> the <S%H3068>Lord<s%> <S%H7760>set<s%> the <S%H2719>sword<s%> of <S%H376>one<s%> against <S%H7453>another<s%> even <S%H3605>throughout<s%> the <S%H3605>whole<s%> <S%H4264>army;<s%> and the <S%H4264>army<s%> <S%H5127>fled<s%> as <S%H5704>far<s%> as Beth-shittah toward <S%H6888>Zererah,<s%> as <S%H5704>far<s%> as the <S%H8193>edge<s%> of Abel-meholah, by <S%H2888>Tabbath.<s%>

And the <S%H376>men<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel<s%> were <S%H6817>summoned<s%> from <S%H5321>Naphtali<s%> and <S%H836>Asher<s%> and <S%H3605>all<s%> <S%H4519>Manasseh,<s%> and they <S%H7291>pursued<s%> <S%H4080>Midian.<s%>

And <S%H1439>Gideon<s%> <S%H7971>sent<s%> <S%H4397>messengers<s%> <S%H3605>throughout<s%> <S%H3605>all<s%> the <S%H2022>hill<s%> <S%H2022>country<s%> of <S%H669>Ephraim,<s%> <S%H559>saying,<s%> <S%H3381>"Come<s%> <S%H3381>down<s%> <S%H7122>against<s%> <S%H4080>Midian<s%> and <S%H3920>take<s%> the <S%H4325>waters<s%> before them, as <S%H5704>far<s%> as Beth-barah and the <S%H3383>Jordan.<s%>" So <S%H3605>all<s%> the <S%H376>men<s%> of <S%H669>Ephraim<s%> were <S%H6817>summoned,<s%> and they <S%H3920>took<s%> the <S%H4325>waters<s%> as <S%H5704>far<s%> as Beth-barah and the <S%H3383>Jordan.<s%>

And they <S%H3920>captured<s%> the <S%H8147>two<s%> <S%H8269>leaders<s%> of <S%H4080>Midian,<s%> <S%H6159>Oreb<s%> and <S%H2062>Zeeb,<s%> and they <S%H2026>killed<s%> <S%H6159>Oreb<s%> at the <S%H6697>rock<s%> of <S%H6159>Oreb,<s%> and they <S%H2026>killed<s%> <S%H2062>Zeeb<s%> at the <S%H3342>wine<s%> <S%H3342>press<s%> of <S%H2062>Zeeb,<s%> while they <S%H7291>pursued<s%> <S%H4080>Midian;<s%> and they <S%H935>brought<s%> the <S%H7218>heads<s%> of <S%H6159>Oreb<s%> and <S%H2062>Zeeb<s%> to <S%H1439>Gideon<s%> from <S%H5676>across<s%> the <S%H3383>Jordan.<s%>
